author: potuz
content: Hello, I'm having trouble with spect tests vectors. I am getting an initial beacon state and a beacon block, but the beacon state has all zeroed out `BlockRoots` and I would expect the last block root to correspond to the initial beacon block's root. What am I missunderstanding?
